Title: Bahram Gur in the Yellow Pavilion
Medium: ink and pigments on laid paper
Description: This folio from Walters manuscript W.611 depicts Bahram Gur in the yellow pavilion.
Keywords: Islamic; Persian; Safavid; Qajar; Book; Codex; Illumination; Illustration; Manuscript; Iran; Literature -- Poetry
Provenance: Ibrahim [date and mode of acquisition unknown]; [partly visible seal impression dated [1]230 (?) AH on fol. 1a]; Henry Walters, Baltimore [date and mode of acquisition unknown]; Walters Art Museum, 1931, by bequest.
Creator: Nizami Ganjavi (Azerbaijani, died 605 AH/AD 1209)
